english: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings, I ___________.
The movie was very ___________; everyone in the cinema was crying.
She was very ___________ with her high grade on the test.
Children must learn to ___________ well in school.
Don't be ___________ of the dog, he is very friendly.
The weather today is ___________; it's raining and very cold.
The teacher tried to ___________ the students to study harder.
He was ___________ because he lost his wallet.
We need to ___________ our flight tickets early.
I was late to work because of a terrible ___________.
In the summer, we love going to the ___________ to swim in the ocean.
The elephant is a ___________ animal.
Can you ___________ me ___________ from school today?
We arrived at the ___________ just before the train left.
Eilat is a city in the ___________ part of Israel.
You have to go through security checks at the ___________.
Who is your favorite ___________ in this movie?
Modern ___________ has changed the way we communicate.
The ___________ told the actors where to stand.
I want to ___________ this song so I can listen to it later.
We saw a great film at the ___________ last night.
She feels nervous when she stands on ___________.
Can I borrow your ___________? I want to take some photos.
What is the ___________ of the book you are reading?
I cannot ___________ to buy a new car right now.
It is hard to ___________ him to change his mind.
Do you ___________ your brothers and sisters?
Don't ___________ me for your mistake!
Who will ___________ the music at the party? (hint: make sure it works/happens)
Alexander Graham Bell helped ___________ the telephone.
I will ___________ you to the doctor so you won't be alone.
Please ___________ me if you have any more questions.
Winning the gold medal was his greatest ___________.
You must sign the ___________ before you start the job.
The car is in good ___________ even though it is old.
She spent her ___________ playing in this park.
Please tell me the whole ___________, don't lie.
He is an ___________ in computer science.
This is a ___________ change; it will affect everyone.
The scientists are doing ___________ to find a cure.
